text: In politics, youth wing is a subdivision of a political party made up of younger members, usually teenagers and young adults.Political parties need to better integrate young members and give them the chance to influence policy. Democratic Audit. Published 11 July 2014. Retrieved 17 December 2018.Youth wings carry politicians to greater heights. Swissinfo. Published 11 July 2014. Retrieved 17 December 2018. They are dedicated to promoting the party's interests, values and policies among young voters, as well as involving them in political activities like campaigns, debates, and advocacy. They can provide opportunities for leadership, civic education, and active participation in party politics. ==References== Category:Political organizations by type
title: Youth wing
